title: Feedback
body:
So have been messing around with some new builds for skarner and vi mainly based around devourer just wanna get some feedback if anyone else tries the builds themselves i myself have pretty much rekt in game with them but just wanna see if thats me just getting lucky so 

Skarner 

Beserker Greaves
Sated Devourer
Bork
Rav Hydra
Trinity Force
Black Cleaver
eventually sell zerks for GhostBlade 

This build is based off his q damage and its cd procs u can basicly spam this in a fight with ur trin procs and basicly never die 

Vi

Ninja Tabi
Sated Devourer
Black Cleaver
Trinity Force
Last Whisper
Maw of Malmortius
eventually sell tabi for Zephyr

This build is based of the w and its hp and armor shredding that it can do u will constantly smashing there armor and doing hp% damage and with phantom hit makes this so easy

So there u go if u try the builds id greatly appreciate some feedback on how it whent as i said not sure if i just got lucky of if the builds themselves are actually op/dam strong ty

replies.body: Hey, i'm yet to try the builds but may i suggest something to add/change to the vi build. If you're going to build "on hit" vi, bork seems like it would fit quite nicely in there instead of a trinity force or black cleaver, although the cdr black cleaver offers is probably better considering you won't get the 10% cdr from the warrior.

i thought about that but vi's w already gives hp% so bork aint really needed plus the build seems to fit in nicely u could get bork at end instead of zehpyr if they are stacking alot of hp but its mainly to crush armor and do alot of damage with ur e and trin procs but ty
